sentences: Veel täna paneks ta oma hõlmad vaheliti ja läheks lauldes Vargamäelt alla.. A. H. Tammsaare.
Hämarus laotas oma hõlmu üle asjade. H. Raudsepp.
Ja langed sa võideldes vahedal raual, / siis õrnasti katab sind isamaa hõlm. K. E. Sööt.
context: The word 'paneks' is a conditional mood form of the Estonian verb 'panna' (to put/place). It appears in the third person singular conditional form, meaning 'he/she/it would put' or 'he/she/it would place'. In the provided examples, it's used to express hypothetical actions or suggestions about what someone might do with their hõlmad (flaps/corners of clothing) in various contexts.
